attributes.action: Do something about global warming now, before its too late
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The face of world could possibly change in as little as 10 years.  With no one taking the affects of global warming seriously, i have created this petition for people who want to do something to protect our planet.  The prime minister should also do more world wide to persuade other countries to do much more on the matter.

I ask for new plans to be put in place worldwide, and a huge recycling incentive to be put into place worldwide.  The burning of rainforests must also be stopped.

Do we want to have our planet for our children to live on? or not?  Its up to you.
